@EU_Commission “pharmacon” means drug. Then how come by EU definition a #medicaldevice has a non-pharmacological mechanism of action, while the same substance is registered as drug for brand A and as medical device for brand B? #movicol #dulcosoft

@EU_Commission the definition of #medicaldevice is a lobbyist’s dream. Cough syrups, anti-diarrhea capsules, laxatives,.. are NOT devices. Change this ridiculous and dangerous definition please! Weak evidenced products threaten the population!
